items.title: New AI-powered method accelerates protein simulations and reveals complex folding dynamics
items.summary: New AI-powered method accelerates protein simulations and reveals complex folding dynamics. An international team led by Einstein Professor Cecilia Clementi in the Department of Physics at Freie Universität Berlin has introduced CGSchNet, a machine-learned coarse-grained (CG) model that can accurately and efficiently simulate proteins like never before.
